
====================
SetupMicroMatterBand
====================

.. currentmodule:: nucleardatapy.setupmicromatterband

.. Don't include inherited members to keep the doc short
.. automodule:: nucleardatapy.setup_micro_matter_band
	:members:

.. figure:: ../../../samples/nucleardatapy_plots/figs/plot_SetupMicroMatterBand_NM.png
	:scale: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	Uncertainty band in NM obtained from the analysis of different predictions: MBPT-2016, QMC-2016 and MBPT-2020.

.. figure:: ../../../samples/nucleardatapy_plots/figs/plot_SetupMicroMatterBand_SM.png
	:scale: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	Uncertainty band in SM obtained from the analysis of different predictions: MBPT-2016 and MBPT-2020.

.. figure:: ../../../samples/nucleardatapy_plots/figs/plot_SetupMicroMatterBand_Esym.png
	:scale: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	Uncertainty band for the symmetry energy obtained from the analysis of different predictions: MBPT-2016 and MBPT-2020.
